active.name: Sora Ashworth
active.appearance:
- **Age:** 19 (young adult)
- **Height:** Petite (approx. 155 cm / 5'1")
- **Build:** Slender, bookish
- **Hair:** Ash-brown, shoulder-length, often tied with a ribbon or quill
- **Eyes:** Soft amber with subtle silver flecks (magical shimmer when active)
- **Clothing:** Rumpled guild archivist robes (muted blues/greys), practical satchels
- **Accessories:** Charm bracelet of past investigation trinkets, well-worn guild badge
- **Aura:** Gentle, unassuming, but intense when focused; often underestimated
active.introducedIn: Chapter 1 – The Ledger and the Lie

active.name: Elara Ashworth
active.description: Sora’s mother, a seamstress who knows about her daughter’s empathic gift. Protective and aware of the family’s magical lineage.
active.introducedIn: Chapter 1 – The Ledger and the Lie

active.name: Kael Ironwood
active.description: Bronze-ranked adventurer and son of Marcus Ironwood. Grieving and determined to uncover the truth about his father’s death.

active.name: Thomas Graystone
active.description: Former adventurer turned Guild assessor. Involved in the murder of Marcus Ironwood and part of a possible conspiracy.

active.name: Elena Brightquill
active.description: Junior clerk in the Guild Archives. Efficient, knowledgeable, and a potential mentor or ally to Sora.

history.name: Elder Matthias
history.description: Village leader of Millhaven for 20 years. Took a bribe to falsify bridge inspection records, leading to the deaths of three merchants. Believed his actions would preserve village prosperity.
history.introducedIn: Chapter 1 – The Ledger and the Lie
